title: Blackbirds & Bourbon
description: For a charm of powerful trouble... Persephone Gosse just can't catch a break.Life isn't supposed to be this hard, even for a witch. Facing a trial for a crime she didn't commit, tangling with bounty hunters looking to take her head, and trying to ignore the growing disdain of the magical world, Seph is barely holding it together.Her confusion about Jack Frost isn't helping. Is her ex trying to save her, or easing her way into an early grave? With Yule approaching and judgement looming, Seph has to decide who to trust...And who to kill.
author: Heather R. Blair
